name: F SPORTS Bike Collection
desc: A fully functional web application and user-centric method using Database and Authentication. User can see their ordered list, consider their valuable feedback at a time. It has a diffferent dashboard for User and Admin. Admin can manage all others ordered, He can manage also Product services.
tools: React, MongoDB, Express, Firebase Auth, Router, Heroku

name: Eatsy Food Delivery
desc: An Authenticational web application using Database. User can see their ordered list, consider their valuable feedback at a time. User can manage also Food services. He can add food and remove food item.
tools: React, MongoDB, Express, Firebase Auth, Router, Heroku

name: Medicenter
desc: It is a health reted website. Authentication added website. Users can see the details of doctors and contact them.
